mapper.select: SELECT A.selliboard, A.writeriuser, A.category, A.model, A.detail_model, A.trading_area , A.price, B.mainimg, C.selliboard, C.likesiuser, D.iuser FROM car_sell_board A INNER JOIN car_image B ON A.selliboard = B.selliboard INNER JOIN likes C ON C.selliboard = A.selliboard INNER JOIN t_user D ON D.iuser = C.likesiuser WHERE D.iuser = ${iuser}
